title: JAMES BEZEL 3MM, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE GOLD RIVIÈRE BRACELET
description:
6.5 INCHES SHIPS ON NOVEMBER 7, 20247 INCHES SHIP ON NOVEMBER 10, 2024 NEW STONE SIZE: 3MM
Our most-worn bezel rivière bracelet in a new, daintier 3MM size. The James Bezel 3MM Rivière Bracelet features lab-grown white sapphires in a bezel setting that outlines each stone with a slim border of 18k gold vermeil.
details:
Metal: 18k gold vermeil - a 2.5 micron layer of gold over sterling silver.

Setting: Bezel
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Stone Size: 3MM
